* Todo list application that allows users to manage tasks.

* @param filePath The file path to store tasks data.
* Entry point to display welcome message and read user input.
* Storage class is responsible for loading and saving tasks to a file.

* List of task meant to be used to create a TaskList object.
* If file does not exist, an empty list is returned.
* @return The list of tasks loaded from file.
* @throws NixyException If there is an error loading tasks from file.

* Utility class for printing messages to the console.

* Prevents instantiation of the PrintUtility class.
* Prints the specified lines with horizontal lines wrapped around them.

* Ui class is responsible for handling user interface.
* It provides methods to read input from the user and display messages to the user.
